page.title: 10Employment
page.content: In Penyffordd the main place of employment is Tunnel Cement which lies slightly outside the village, with a work force which consists of six hundred people from Penyffordd.Other business in the Penyffordd area are a turkey farm ,agricultural farms and Alec Astbury Ltd.There are a few newsagents in Penyffordd an example of one is J.C. and P.Catherall which is also a milk retailer.There is also a hospital where old people are looked after, callled meadowslea and employes doctors,nurses,occupational therapists ,cleaners and caterers.Other business include the garages,general stores, grocers, butchers and public houses which employ a fair amount of people. Most inhabitants however work outside the area at main employes such as British Steel,Shotton,British Aerospace,Vauxhalls,Ellsmere Port.
